channel.description: Require an additional authenticator when outside of US Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: See existing content link for more details. Links to original docs: - Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-signon-policy/main/ - The intro section is not included here but in a separate guide here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Crp_KOmCPqiA3dWuCD5Q3jyx_wCussVFLVhNoPufxnw/edit Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
